comment:
* A class that provides access to the java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
     * and java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent without creating a static dependency
     * on java.beans. This class can be removed once the addPropertyChangeListener
     * and removePropertyChangeListener methods are removed.

methods.name: private static Constructor<?> getConstructor(Class<?> c, Class<?>... types)
private static Method getMethod(Class<?> c, String name, Class<?>... types)
static boolean isBeansPresent()
methods.comment: * Returns {@code true} if java.beans is present.

methods.name: static Object newPropertyChangeEvent(Object source, String prop, Object oldValue, Object newValue)
methods.comment:
* Returns a new PropertyChangeEvent with the given source, property
         * name, old and new values.

methods.name: static void invokePropertyChange(Object listener, Object ev)
methods.comment:
* Invokes the given PropertyChangeListener's propertyChange method
         * with the given event.

methodNames: private static Constructor<?> getConstructor(Class<?> c, Class<?>... types)
private static Method getMethod(Class<?> c, String name, Class<?>... types)
static Object newPropertyChangeEvent(Object source, String prop, Object oldValue, Object newValue)
static void invokePropertyChange(Object listener, Object ev)
